title: Liam Novak
description: Liam Novak is an adventure photographer from Silverthorne, Colorado who's mission is to share the world from new perspectives. Using PWA technology I was able to provide him with an optimized way to show off his photos and not sacrifice site performance.

title: Limitless Wake
description: When Chandler Crouch started offering wakeboarding lessons in Austin, Texas he needed a way to reach his clients and be heard over the competition. By using Gatsby and Netlify CMS I was able to build him a dynamic site that was optimized for Google that could help him be found online.

title: TensorFlow Color Classifier
description: This color classification app was built out of a curiousity for machine learning. It uses the TensorFlow JS library to train a model on RGB color data. A user can then pick any color and the app will categorize the color into one of nine categories.

title: Mountaineering Trivia
description: The first website that I built from scratch, Mountaineering Trivia is an edcuational game that teaches people about basic mountaineering equipment. It was created with HTML5, JavaScript, jQuery, and CSS3.
